comments:
An user reports that after importing an ear to the workspace, got an error pop up window with message "Multiple errors has occurred" with error details information "An internal error occurred during: Loading artifact edit for project" and "java.lang.NullPointerException"

In the .log, also found the following information:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-04-02 15:47:30.218
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Loading artifact edit for project".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.componentcore.util.WSDDArtifactEdit.getWsdlResource(WSDDArtifactEdit.java:467)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getWSDLResource(WebServicesManager.java:508)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getInternalWSDLResources(WebServicesManager.java:420)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getInternalWSDLServices(WebServicesManager.java:412)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getAllWSDLServices(WebServicesManager.java:488)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.notifyListeners(WebServicesManager.java:302)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager$ProcessProjectsWithWSDL.run(WebServicesManager.java:896)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

I will send the ear via email once this bugzilla has been assigned.
tested it with WebServiceSamples.ear did not produce exceptions.

+1
Since prevents importing this EAR, I approve. 
What is it about this EAR that causes the problem? 
You should document (roughly) the frequency this would been seen by users, 
but, again, since we have this case in hand, I approve.
checked fix into both 1.5.4 and 2.0 streams.
